article_metadata.news-keywords: Miami, worldcenter, subsidy, labor, union, tax, CRA, poverty, jobs, Hardemon, Motwani, Schnidman, slum
article_metadata.description: Targeting a $108 million tax-rebate deal, labor groups and lawsuits have turned the massive Miami Worldcenter into a political punching bag.
